title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 622.3 - Agency filing of SEQRA documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 622.3 - Agency filing of SEQRA documents

State Regulations
(a) Principles of compliance. (1)

The OPWDD shall
maintain, in the central OPWDD files available for public inspection containing
all completed applications (see glossary), negative declarations, notices of
determinations of significance, notices of completion of draft and final
environmental impact statements, notices of public hearings, draft and final
environmental impact statements, and decisions it has prepared or caused to be
prepared. (2)

Copies of these
documents shall be available to the public at a cost determined pursuant to the
provisions of 14 NYCRR Part
603. (b) Standards of
certification. [
Reserved
]. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
